meta_description: The Historic BK House & Gardens is a National Historic Landmark built in 1826. We are open for guided tours Monday - Saturday, from 10 AM - 3 PM.
hours_text:
## Tour Historic BK House & Gardens

We are currently open for tours, Monday – Tuesday and Thursday – Saturday, from 10-3pm.

**For a full list of procedures and protocol being followed to ensure the safety of visitors, staff and volunteers,[visit here.](http://web.archive.org/web/20251109034836/https://bkhouse.org/covid-19-re-opening-protocol/)**

A look Inside the tour: Our tour explores two hundred years of French Quarter history through the lens of the diverse families and individuals who have called the Historic BK House home. Visitors will be invited to tour inside the main house, built in 1826, and period parterre garden. They will also take in exterior views of the dependency buildings, original slave quarter and courtyard, and learn about these important multi-use spaces and their former inhabitants in an outdoor setting. We look forward to welcoming visitors back inside these tighter spaces – which also house the 1950s writing studio of Frances Parkinson Keyes – when it is safe to do so.

**For an overview of the house’s history and its former inhabitants,[visit here.](http://web.archive.org/web/20251109034836/https://bkhouse.org/about/)**

[Book a Tour](http://web.archive.org/web/20251109034836/https://fareharbor.com/embeds/book/bkhouse/?full-items=yes)

## Hours

  * Monday……………… 10:00am – 3:00pm
  * Tuesday…………….. 10:00am – 3:00pm 
  * **Wednesday……………. CLOSED**
  * Thursday……………. 10:00am – 3:00pm
  * Friday………………….. 10:00am – 3:00pm

admission_text:
## Become a Friend of BK Historic House & Gardens

### Benefits of Membership: 

Complimentary tours, discounted admission to programs, a 10% discount in the gift shop, and advance notice of BKH events!

### Now Two Ways to Give! 

Single and Household Membership are available for one-time payments and good for one full year. Sustaining Memberships offer a way to give to Historic BK House through smaller donations automatically debited from your account each month. Please consider becoming a monthly sustainer!

### NARM 

Historic BK House & Gardens is a proud member of the [North American Reciprocal Museum Association](http://web.archive.org/web/20251109044148/https://narmassociation.org/), an extensive network of cultural institutions nation-wide which grant reciprocal complimentary admission for tours for qualifying members. We extend this amazing benefit to members at our Historian Membership and above.

collections_text:
# Welcome to Historic BK House & Gardens

The**Historic BK House & Gardens** is a National Historic Landmark built in 1826. This architectural treasure is an outstanding example of a raised center hall villa and includes both Creole and American features in an elaborately detailed residence. BK House’s diverse history includes the stories of those who both lived and labored here for nearly 200 years, offering a unique educational experience to visitors, which furthers the understanding of New Orleans history. The house, parterre garden and lovely courtyard have been featured in several films and television shows and are favorites for guided tours, weddings, and special events.  

We are open for guided tours on the hour, Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, Friday and Saturday

from 10 AM – 3 PM.

## Upcoming Programs

[More Info](http://web.archive.org/web/20260114032950/https://bkhouse.org/weddings-events/)
